the top of the hat 27 wide by 23 cm long yarn worsted weight medium category 4 1/3 skein of red heart granny square all in one yarn 100% acrylic 417 yards 381 m per 250-gram skein that is about 139 yards 127 meters or 83 grams of yarn the sample blanket used 1/3 skein of red heart granny square all in one yarn in the soft white citrus twist colorway hook 6 5 mm us k gauge 13 stitches = 4 inches 10 cm in moss stitch single_crochet chain 1 13 row = 4 inches 10 cm terms us chain yarn over and pull through loop on hook slip_stitch slip_stitch insert hook into stitch yarn over pull through stitch and loop on the hook single_crochet single_crochet insert hook into stitch or space yarn over pull through stitch or space yarn over again pull through both loops on hook foundation single_crochet a method for beginning a project without having to make a separate row of chains first it creates a nice straight even starting edge here s a video tutorial by tamara kelly of mooglyblog com https //www mooglyblog com/foundation-single-crochet-fsc/ the lively hat crochet pattern © 2024 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful pattern notes you can make your hat any size you want by adjusting the number of starting chains any odd number of starting chains works for this pattern the whole hat uses moss stitch which is a repeating single_crochet chain 1 pattern moss stitch is sometimes called linen stitch this pattern is worked in the round in a continuous spiral without joining between rounds after round 1 go with the flow of color changes- no cutting or controlling of colors needed round 1 chain 69 slip_stitch to 1st chain to form a ring chain 1 single_crochet in each chain around slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 69 single_crochet or foundation single_crochet 69 slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet to form a ring 69 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 does not count as a st single_crochet in same stitch as join chain 1 skip next stitch single_crochet in next stitch 34 times chain 1 70 sts rounds 3 - 30 single_crochet in first chain-1 space of previous round chain 1 single_crochet in next chain-1 space 34 times chain 1 70 sts your piece should be about 9 inches 23 cm long after 30 row you can work additional row for a slouchier look close the hat with a few single_crochet stitches to gather the top as shown below fasten_off and weave in ends closing the top of the hat the top of the hat is closed with a few slip stitches lay hat flat with your hook
